specialization: Google Forms Automation Platform with MercadoPago Integration
stack_expertise: Google Forms API v1 + Drive API v3

clean_architecture.domain_layer: Pure business logic with entities: FormEntity, QuestionEntity, UserEntity, CreditEntity
clean_architecture.application_layer: Use cases: CreateFormUseCase, UploadFileUseCase, ProcessPaymentUseCase, services: FileParserService, GoogleFormsService, CreditService, PaymentService
clean_architecture.presentation_layer: Container-View pattern with custom hooks: useFileUpload, useFormCreation, useCredits, useAuth

atomic_design.atoms: shadcn/ui components: Button, Input, Card, Dialog, Form, etc.

firebase_config.security_rules: User-based access with role permissions (admin, pro, free)

google_apis.forms_api: v1 - Form creation, question management, response handling
google_apis.drive_api: v3 - File storage, sharing permissions, folder management
google_apis.oauth2: Token refresh, scope management, consent handling

file_processing.detection: Automatic question type detection with ML fallback
file_processing.validation: File format, structure validation, XSS prevention
file_processing.progress: Real-time progress tracking (0-100%) with WebSocket fallback

parsing.validation_schema: Zod schemas for each question type

design_system.typography: Inter font family with system fallbacks
design_system.components: shadcn/ui with custom variants and animations

unit_tests.coverage: 90%+ target for domain and application layers

integration_tests.scope: API routes, Firebase repositories, Google APIs

e2e_tests.scope: Complete user flows: upload → create → publish → manage
e2e_tests.coverage: Critical paths: signup, payment, form creation

common_tasks.form_creation: Parse file → validate questions → create Google Form → store metadata → update credits → notify user
common_tasks.file_upload: Drag & drop → validation → parsing → preview → edit → confirm → publish
common_tasks.payment_flow: Select plan → generate preference → redirect to MercadoPago → webhook notification → update credits → send confirmation
common_tasks.user_management: OAuth signup → credit assignment → usage tracking → analytics → retention campaigns
common_tasks.error_handling: User-friendly messages → error boundaries → retry mechanisms → logging → alerts

debugging_tools.logging: Structured logging with levels: debug, info, warn, error, with emojis for quick identification
debugging_tools.dev_tools: React DevTools, Redux DevTools, React Query DevTools, Firebase Emulator Suite
debugging_tools.firebase: Local emulator suite: localhost:4000 for auth, firestore, storage, functions
debugging_tools.api_testing: Google APIs Explorer, Postman collections, curl scripts for webhooks
debugging_tools.performance: Next.js Analytics, Web Vitals, Bundle analyzer, Lighthouse CI

performance_optimization.bundle_size: Dynamic imports, code splitting, tree shaking
performance_optimization.images: Next.js Image component, WebP format, lazy loading
performance_optimization.api_calls: React Query caching, optimistic updates, debounced inputs
performance_optimization.file_processing: Web Workers for heavy parsing, streaming uploads, progress tracking

security_best_practices.authentication: OAuth 2.0 with PKCE, session management, token refresh
security_best_practices.data_protection: Input validation, XSS prevention, SQL injection prevention
security_best_practices.api_security: Rate limiting, CORS configuration, API key rotation
security_best_practices.file_security: Virus scanning, file type validation, size limits
